contest-event.event-date: Nov. 13, 1971 D National Mineworkers (Second Section) National Mineworkers (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-second-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Second A Downland Suite Winter Gardens (Pavilion Theatre), Blackpool, England, UK 10th annual contest. 11 bands competed. April 24, 2013, 9:20 a.m. July 15, 2016, 10:29 p.m. 1 Ystalyfera Public Lewis Williams 2 Betteshanger Brass Band Walter B.
